languages.text: "Тервантьяс — союзник Иремерисс, не мой. Опустошительная буря покровительствовала ему — как и культу ведьм с Арены. Я обращался к его искусству несколько раз... и каждый раз это было непросто: в последнее время он больше отсутствовал, чем находился в Комморре. Скорее всего — был в каком-то из своих логовищ, где прятал иные эксперименты и работы".

"Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."
languages.original_text: "Тервантьяс — союзник Иремерисс, не мой. Опустошительная буря покровительствовала ему — как и культу ведьм с Арены. Я обращался к его искусству несколько раз... и каждый раз это было непросто: в последнее время он больше отсутствовал, чем находился в Комморре. Скорее всего — был в каком-то из своих логовищ, где прятал иные эксперименты и работы".

I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Tervantias era aliado de Yremeryss, no mío. La Tempestad Asoladora es su patrocinadora, además de patrocinar a las Brujas de la arena. He tenido que acudir a sus servicios en varias ocasiones y nunca ha sido fácil. Últimamente pasa menos tiempo en Commorragh que fuera. Probablemente esté visitando una de las guaridas donde aloja sus otros experimentos y creaciones».
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

traits.locale_text: «Tervantias es aliado de Yremeryss, no mío. La Tempestad Asoladora es su patrocinadora, además de patrocinar a las Brujas de la arena. He tenido que acudir a sus servicios en varias ocasiones y nunca ha sido fácil. Últimamente pasa menos tiempo en Commorragh que fuera. Probablemente esté visitando una de las guaridas donde aloja sus otros experimentos y creaciones».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “特万提亚斯是伊芮梅莉斯的盟友，不是我的。狂风阴谋团是他的庇护主，也是竞技场上那些巫灵的庇护主。我曾多次找寻他的艺术品，但每次都困难重重，因为那段时间，他离开科摩罗的时候比在科摩罗的时候还多。那个时候，他很可能是去了别的巢穴，他其余的实验品与作品都藏在那些地方。”
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

traits.locale_text: “特万提亚斯是伊芮梅莉斯的盟友，不是我的。狂风阴谋团是他的庇护主，也是竞技场上那些巫灵的庇护主。我曾多次找寻他的艺术品，但每次都困难重重，因为那段时间，他离开科摩罗的时候比在科摩罗的时候还多。那个时候，他很可能是去了别的巢穴，他其余的实验品与作品都藏在那些地方。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「テルヴァンティアスはイレメリスの仲間だ。俺の仲間じゃない。略奪の嵐はあいつの支援者であり、闘技場のウィッチの支援者でもある。何度かその芸術的才能を掘り出そうとしたが、最近のあいつはコモラフにいない時の方が多いせいで困難を極めた。おそらく、他の実験や創作物を隠している隠れ家のひとつにいたのだろう」
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

traits.locale_text: 「テルヴァンティアスはイレメリスの仲間だ。俺の仲間じゃない。略奪の嵐はあいつの支援者であり、闘技場のウィッチの支援者でもある。何度かその芸術的才能を掘り出そうとしたが、最近のあいつはコモラフにいない時の方が多いせいで困難を極めた。おそらく、他の実験や創作物を隠している隠れ家のひとつにいたのだろう」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Tervantias était l'allié d'Yremeryss, pas le mien. La Tempête ravageuse l'a pris sous son aile, de même que les Cérastes de l'arène. J'ai plusieurs fois cherché à recourir à ses talents, et il n'est guère facile de lui mettre la main dessus... Dernièrement, il s'est très souvent absenté de Commorragh. Il s'est probablement réfugié dans l'un de ses repaires, où il conserve ses autres créations et expériences à l'abri des regards indiscrets. »
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

traits.locale_text: « Tervantias est l'allié d'Yremeryss, pas le mien. La Tempête ravageuse l'a pris sous son aile, de même que les Cérastes de l'arène. J'ai plusieurs fois cherché à recourir à ses talents, et il n'est guère facile de lui mettre la main dessus... Dernièrement, il s'est très souvent absenté de Commorragh. Il s'est probablement réfugié dans l'un de ses repaires, où il conserve ses autres créations et expériences à l'abri des regards indiscrets. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Tervantias war Yremeryss' Verbündeter, nicht der meine. Der plündernde Sturm ist sein Patron, und auch der Patron der Hekatari der Arena. Ich hatte mehrfach Grund, seine Kunstfertigkeit in Anspruch zu nehmen, und jedes Mal mit Schwierigkeiten — in letzter Zeit war er seltener in Commorragh als anderswo. Er war vermutlich in einem seiner Verstecke, in denen er seine anderen Experimente und Schöpfungen versteckt."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

traits.locale_text: "Tervantias ist Yremeryss' Verbündeter, nicht der meine. Der plündernde Sturm ist sein Patron, und auch der Patron der Hekatari der Arena. Ich hatte mehrfach Grund, seine Kunstfertigkeit in Anspruch zu nehmen, und jedes Mal mit Schwierigkeiten — in letzter Zeit war er seltener in Commorragh als anderswo. Er war vermutlich in einem seiner Verstecke, in denen er seine anderen Experimente und Schöpfungen versteckt."

languages.original_text: "Tervantias is Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."

languages.text: "Tervantias, Yremeryss'in adamıydı... Benim değil. Müfteris Kasırga hem onun hem de arena Viçlerinin hamisidir. Benim de zanaatından yararlanmak istediğim zamanlar oldu. Her biri de birbirinden zorluydu. Son zamanlarda da Commorragh'a pek uğramaz oldu. Kesin inlerinden bir tanesine kapanmış; deneyleriyle, yaratımlarıyla uğraşıyordur."
languages.original_text: "Tervantias was Yremeryss's ally, not mine. The Reaving Tempest is his patron, and patron also to the Wyches of the arena. I have had cause to seek out his artistry several times, and each time with difficulty — of late he has been gone from Commorragh more often than he has been in it. He was probably in one of his lairs where he hides his other experiments and creations."
